scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run format
scripts.build:doc:save: typedoc --tsconfig tsconfig.package.json && git add -A && git commit -a -m 'Update doc'
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push origin --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push origin --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push origin --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && git push origin --follow-tags && npm publish --tag=next
scripts.release:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && git push origin --follow-tags && npm publish --tag=next
